docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Aug. 8.--It is reported here today that Yuyamtorg, the Soviet trading agency in Buenos Aires, plans to move its offices to Montevideo and make this city headquarters for all its South American
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Aug. 8.--It is reported here today that Yuyamtorg, the Soviet trading agency in Buenos Aires, plans to move its offices to Montevideo and make this city headquarters for all its South American
docs.abstract: Yuzhamtorg may move to Montevideo, Uruguay

headline.main: MONTEVIDEO MAY GET SOVIET TRADE AGENCY; Yuyamtorg Reported Planning to Quit Buenos Aires--Delicate Situation Is Feared.

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Trading in the listed bond market yesterday was the smallest for any Saturday in three years. The turnover amounted to only $3,260,000, the smallest since Aug. 4, 1928, when the amount was about $75,000 less.
docs.lead_paragraph: Trading in the listed bond market yesterday was the smallest for any Saturday in three years. The turnover amounted to only $3,260,000, the smallest since Aug. 4, 1928, when the amount was about $75,000 less.

headline.main: BOND PRICES WEAK IN LIGHT TRADING; Turnover on Stock Exchange Smallest for a Saturday in 3 Years, at $3,260,000. GERMAN ISSUES HOLD FIRM Domestic Rails Touch New Lows for 1931 on Slight Declines-- Convertibles Easier.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Aug. 9.--Newspapers here are demanding that the government investigate Yuyamtorg activities in Uruguay, arguing that it has been proved Soviet commercial activities in Argentina.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Aug. 9.--Newspapers here are demanding that the government investigate Yuyamtorg activities in Uruguay, arguing that it has been proved Soviet commercial activities in Argentina.
docs.abstract: Uruguayan press asks inquiry into rept that Buenos Aires office of Yuzhamtorg is spreading propaganda

headline.main: URUGUAY PRESS ASKS YUYAMTORG INQUIRY; Communist Propaganda Suspected --Head of Buenos Aires Office Remains in Montevideo.
